description: SWADL (Symphony Workflow Automation Definition Language) is a language to describe workflows on Symphony.

id.description: Workflow's id should start with a letter. It is optional. If no id is provided, the workflow filename is used. Otherwise, it will be generated. The id will appear in logs and audit trails.

variables.description: Variables are accessible and editable within the entire workflow. A map of key: value entries is expected.

activities.description: A list of activities to be executed by the workflow. By default the execution is sequential but complex logic can be orchestrated with if/else conditions as well as on/activity-finished events.
activities.$comment: Defined like this to support both validation and autocompletion, even with custom activities. Last item is removed on the fly during validation and replaced by known custom activities.

update-room.description: Updates the attributes of an existing chat room.
update-room.x-intellij-html-description:
Updates the attributes of an existing chat room.

https://developers.symphony.com/restapi/reference#update-room-v3

add-room-member.description: Adds new members to an existing room.
add-room-member.x-intellij-html-description:
Adds a new members to an existing room.

https://developers.symphony.com/restapi/reference#add-member

remove-room-member.description: Removes an existing member from an existing room.
remove-room-member.x-intellij-html-description:
Removes an existing member from an existing room.

https://developers.symphony.com/restapi/reference#remove-member

promote-room-owner.description: Promotes user to owner of the chat room.
promote-room-owner.x-intellij-html-description:
Promotes user to owner of the chat room.

https://developers.symphony.com/restapi/reference#promote-owner

demote-room-owner.description: Demotes room owner to a participant in the chat room.
demote-room-owner.x-intellij-html-description:
Demotes room owner to a participant in the chat room.

https://developers.symphony.com/restapi/reference#demote-owner

send-message.description: Posts a message to an existing stream.
send-message.x-intellij-html-description:
Posts a message to an existing stream.

https://developers.symphony.com/restapi/reference#create-message-v4

add-user-role.description: Adds a role or optional entitleable action to a user’s account.
add-user-role.x-intellij-html-description:
Adds a role or optional entitleable action to a user’s account.

https://developers.symphony.com/restapi/reference#add-role

remove-user-role.description: Removes a role or optional entitleable action from a user’s account.
remove-user-role.x-intellij-html-description:
Removes a role or optional entitleable action from a user’s account.

https://developers.symphony.com/restapi/reference#remove-role

get-user.description: Returns details for a particular user.

get-users.description: Returns a list of users ID, including user metadata.
get-users.x-intellij-html-description:
Returns a list of users ID, including user metadata.

https://developers.symphony.com/restapi/reference#list-users-v2

get-stream.description: Returns information about a particular stream.

get-room.description: Returns information about a particular chat room.
get-room.x-intellij-html-description:
Returns information about a particular chat room.

https://developers.symphony.com/restapi/reference#room-info-v3

get-message.description: Returns a message found by id.

get-stream-members.description: Returns a list of all the current members of a stream (IM, MIM, or chatroom).
get-stream-members.x-intellij-html-description:
Returns a list of all the current members of a stream (IM, MIM, or chatroom).

https://developers.symphony.com/restapi/reference#room-members

get-room-members.description: Lists the current members of an existing room.
get-room-members.x-intellij-html-description:
Lists the current members of an existing room.

https://developers.symphony.com/restapi/reference#room-members

get-user-streams.description: Returns a list of all the streams of which the requesting user is a member, sorted by creation date (ascending - oldest to newest).
get-user-streams.x-intellij-html-description:
Returns a list of all the streams of which the requesting user is a member, sorted by creation date (ascending - oldest to newest).

https://developers.symphony.com/restapi/reference#list-user-streams

get-streams.description: Returns a list of all the streams (IMs, MIMs, and chatrooms) for the calling user's company, sorted by creation date (ascending – oldest to newest).
get-streams.x-intellij-html-description:
Returns a list of all the streams (IMs, MIMs, and chatrooms) for the calling user's company, sorted by creation date (ascending – oldest to newest).

https://developers.symphony.com/restapi/reference#list-streams-for-enterprise-v2

create-connection.description: Send a connection request to another user.
create-connection.x-intellij-html-description:
Send a connection request to another user.

https://developers.symphony.com/restapi/reference#create-connection

accept-connection.description: Accept the connection request for a requesting user.
accept-connection.x-intellij-html-description:
Accept the connection request for a requesting user.

https://developers.symphony.com/restapi/reference#accepted-connection

reject-connection.description: Reject the connection request from a requesting user.
reject-connection.x-intellij-html-description:
Reject the connection request from a requesting user.

https://developers.symphony.com/restapi/reference#reject-connection

remove-connection.description: Remove a connection with a user.

get-rooms.description: Search for rooms, querying name, description, and specified keywords.
get-rooms.x-intellij-html-description:
Search for rooms, querying name, description, and specified keywords.

https://developers.symphony.com/restapi/reference#search-rooms-v3

get-messages.description:
Get messages from an existing stream (IM, MIM, or chatroom).
Additionally returns any attachments associated with the message.
get-messages.x-intellij-html-description:
Get messages from an existing stream (IM, MIM, or chatroom). Additionally returns any attachments associated with the message.

https://developers.symphony.com/restapi/reference#messages-v4

get-connections.description: Get one or multiple connections statuses

^(?!create-room|update-room|add-room-mem.$comment: Match everything that is not an already known activity to allow for custom activities to be used.

local.description: If true then a local DB search will be performed and only local pod users will be returned. If absent or false then a directory search will be performed and users from other pods who are visible to the calling user will also be returned.

active.description: If true, it searches for active users only. If false, it searches for inactive users only. If not set, it searches for all users regardless of their status.

on.description: Events that can trigger the activity execution.
on.x-intellij-html-description:
Events that can trigger the activity execution.

List of real-time events: https://docs.developers.symphony.com/building-bots-on-symphony/datafeed/real-time-events

timeout.description: Timeout while waiting for events, expressed as an ISO 8601 duration.

form-replied.description: Generated when a user replies to a bot message that contains an interactive form with UX components such as text fields, radio buttons, checkboxes, person selectors and more.
form-replied.x-intellij-html-description:
Generated when a user replies to a bot message that contains an interactive form with UX components such as text fields, radio buttons, checkboxes, person selectors and more. Please refer to Symphony Elements.

https://docs.developers.symphony.com/building-bots-on-symphony/datafeed/real-time-events#symphony-elements-action

message-received.description: Generated when a message is sent in an IM, MIM, or chatroom of which the user in context is a member, including messages sent by the user him/herself.
message-received.x-intellij-html-description:
Generated when a message is sent in an IM, MIM, or chatroom of which the user in context is a member, including messages sent by the user him/herself.

https://docs.developers.symphony.com/building-bots-on-symphony/datafeed/real-time-events#message-sent

post-shared.description: Generated when either the user in context shares a wall post written by another user or another user shares a wall post written by the user in context.
post-shared.x-intellij-html-description:
Generated when either:

  • The user in context shares a wall post written by another user.
  • Another user shares a wall post written by the user in context.

    • https://docs.developers.symphony.com/building-bots-on-symphony/datafeed/real-time-events#shared-wall-posts

im-created.description: Generated when an IM or MIM is created with the user in context as a member, initiated either by the user in context or another user.
im-created.x-intellij-html-description:
Generated when an IM or MIM is created with the user in context as a member, initiated either by the user in context or another user.

https://docs.developers.symphony.com/building-bots-on-symphony/datafeed/real-time-events#im-mim-created

room-created.description: Generated when a room is created by the user in context.
room-created.x-intellij-html-description:
Generated when a room is created by the user in context.

https://docs.developers.symphony.com/building-bots-on-symphony/datafeed/real-time-events#room-created

room-updated.description: Generated when a room of which the user in context is a member is updated, including rooms updated by the user him/herself.
room-updated.x-intellij-html-description:
Generated when a room of which the user in context is a member is updated, including rooms updated by the user him/herself.

https://docs.developers.symphony.com/building-bots-on-symphony/datafeed/real-time-events#room-updated-message

room-deactivated.description: Generated when a room of which the user in context is a member is deactivated, including rooms deactivated by the user him/herself.
room-deactivated.x-intellij-html-description:
Generated when a room of which the user in context is a member is deactivated, including rooms deactivated by the user him/herself.

https://docs.developers.symphony.com/building-bots-on-symphony/datafeed/real-time-events#room-deactivated-message

room-reactivated.description: Generated when a room of which the user in context is a member is reactivated, including rooms reactivated by the user him/herself.
room-reactivated.x-intellij-html-description:
Generated when a room of which the user in context is a member is reactivated, including rooms reactivated by the user him/herself.

https://docs.developers.symphony.com/building-bots-on-symphony/datafeed/real-time-events#room-reactivated-message

room-member-promoted-to-owner.description: Generated when a user is promoted from a participant to an owner of a room of which the user in context is a member, including when the user himself is promoted to an owner or promotes another user.
room-member-promoted-to-owner.x-intellij-html-description:
Generated when a user is promoted from a participant to an owner of a room of which the user in context is a member, including when the user himself is promoted to an owner or promotes another user.

https://docs.developers.symphony.com/building-bots-on-symphony/datafeed/real-time-events#room-member-promoted-to-owner

room-member-demoted-from-owner.description: Generated when a user is demoted from an owner to a participant of a room of which the user in context is a member, including when the user himself is demoted to a participant or demotes another user.
room-member-demoted-from-owner.x-intellij-html-description:
Generated when a user is demoted from an owner to a participant of a room of which the user in context is a member, including when the user himself is demoted to a participant or demotes another user.

https://docs.developers.symphony.com/building-bots-on-symphony/datafeed/real-time-events#room-member-demoted-from-owner

user-joined-room.description: Generated when a new user joins or is added to a room of which the user in context is a member, including when the user himself joins or is added to a room.
user-joined-room.x-intellij-html-description:
Generated when a new user joins or is added to a room of which the user in context is a member, including when the user himself joins or is added to a room.

https://docs.developers.symphony.com/building-bots-on-symphony/datafeed/real-time-events#user-joined-room

user-left-room.description: Generated when a user leaves or is removed from a room of which the user in context is a member, including when the user himself leaves or is removed from a room.
user-left-room.x-intellij-html-description:
Generated when a user leaves or is removed from a room of which the user in context is a member, including when the user himself leaves or is removed from a room.

https://docs.developers.symphony.com/building-bots-on-symphony/datafeed/real-time-events#user-left-room

user-requested-join-room.description: Generated when a user requests to join a room. Only the user who requested to join the room and the owners of that room will receive this event on their datafeeds.
user-requested-join-room.x-intellij-html-description:
Generated when a user requests to join a room. Only the user who requested to join the room and the owners of that room will receive this event on their datafeeds.

https://docs.developers.symphony.com/building-bots-on-symphony/datafeed/real-time-events#user-requested-to-join-room

connection-requested.description: Generated when a connection request is sent, either by the user in context to another user or to the user in context by another user.
connection-requested.x-intellij-html-description:
Generated when a connection request is sent, either:

  • Sent by the user in context to another user.
  • Sent to the user in context by another user.

    • https://docs.developers.symphony.com/building-bots-on-symphony/datafeed/real-time-events#connection-requested

connection-accepted.description: Generated when a connection request is accepted, either sent by the user in context and accepted by another user or sent by another user and accepted by the user in context.
connection-accepted.x-intellij-html-description:
Generated when a connection request is accepted, either:

  • Sent by the user in context and accepted by another user.
  • Sent by another user and accepted by the user in context.

    • https://docs.developers.symphony.com/building-bots-on-symphony/datafeed/real-time-events#connection-accepted

activity-expired.description: Generated when the given activity has expired without ending completely. Note this is not a Datafeed real-time event.

activity-completed.description: Generated when the given activity is completed. Note this is not a Datafeed real-time event.
activity-completed.x-intellij-html-description: Generated when the given activity is completed. Note this is not a Datafeed real-time event.

one-of.description: Used to receive at least one of the listed events. Note this is not a Datafeed real-time event.
one-of.x-intellij-html-description: Used to receive at least one of the listed events. Note this is not a Datafeed real-time event.

timer-fired.description: Timer based event. It is either triggered at a given point in time using the keyword "at" or repeated using the keyword "repeat". Note this is not a Datafeed real-time event.
timer-fired.x-intellij-html-description:
Timer based event. It is either triggered at:

  • a given point in time using the keyword "at".
  • repeated using the keyword "repeat".
    • Note this is not a Datafeed real-time event.

repeat.description: ISO 8601 repeating intervals to repeat the current activity.

at.description: ISO 8601 date presenting a point in time when the current activity should be executed.

form-id.description: Form's id. The id should be the same as activity's one that defines the form.

requires-bot-mention.description: If true, the event is only triggered if the bot is mentioned.

activity-id.description: The activity id that the expiration triggers this event.
The activity id that the completion triggers this event.

basic-activity-inner.description: Inner property having common properties for every activity.

id.description: Activity's identifier, should be unique across workflow. As it can be used as a variable identifier only alphanumerical characters are allowed.

if.description: Property to specify an activity to be executed if the condition is true

else.description: Property to specify an activity to be executed if the condition is false

anyOf.description: Room's name. Room names will be considered the same if they only differ in capitalization and whitespace. E.g. "room1" and "R O O M 1" are considered the same. Also, room names must be shorter than 50 characters.

keywords.description: A list of key-value pairs, describing additional properties of the room.

membersCanInvite.description: If true, any chat room participant can add new participants. If false, only owners can add new participants.

discoverable.description: If true, this chat room (name, description and messages) non-participants can search for this room. If false, only participants can search for this room.

public.description:
If true, this is a public chatroom. If false, a private chatroom.
Note: Once this value is set for a room, it is read-only and can’t be updated.
public.x-intellij-html-description:
If true, this is a public chatroom. If false, a private chatroom.
Note: Once this value is set for a room, it is read-only and can’t be updated.

readOnly.description:
If true, only stream owners can send messages.
Note: Once this value is set for a room, it is read-only and can’t be updated.
readOnly.x-intellij-html-description:
If true, only stream owners can send messages.
Note: Once this value is set for a room, it is read-only and can’t be updated.

copyProtected.description:
If true, users cannot copy content from this room.
Note: Once this value is set to true for a room, it is read-only and can’t be updated.
copyProtected.x-intellij-html-description:
If true, users cannot copy content from this room.
Note: Once this value is set to true for a room, it is read-only and can’t be updated.

crossPod.description: If true, this room is a cross-pod room.

viewHistory.description: If true, new members can view the room chat history of the room.

multiLateralRoom.description: If true, this is a multilateral room where users belonging to more than 2 companies can be found.

active.description: If false, the room is not active anymore.

stream-id.description: Stream id where to add user(s).

user-ids.description: User ids to add to the room.

stream-id.description: Stream id where to remove user(s).

user-ids.description: User ids to remove from the room.

stream-id.description: Stream id where to promote user.

user-ids.description: User ids to promote in the room.

stream-id.description: Stream id where to demote user.

user-ids.description: User ids to demote in the room.

to.description: The recipient (conversation, IM, MI or chatroom) in which the message should be posted.

content.description: The content of the message in MessageML format. Must contain at least one space. In case the content is a form, this latter's id should be the same as the send-message activity one.

attachments.description: One or more attachments to be sent along with the message.

script.description: Script to execute (only Groovy is supported)

email.$comment: Variable or email regex is accepted.

company-name.description:
The user's company name.
If not specified, it is set with the default company name.

asset-classes.description: The user's asset classes (one or more).

industries.description: The user's job industries (one or more).

functions.description: The user's job functions (one or more).

market-coverages.description: The user's market coverage (one or more).

recommended-language.description: The recommended language. As an ISO 639-1 code.

password.description:
User's password. The password object is optional for end-user accounts (NORMAL). For example, if your organization utilizes SSO, you may not want to specify the password.

Please note the password object is not used for service accounts (SYSTEM) and therefore cannot be entered in the request payload.

hashedPassword.description: A base64-encoded string. The hashed password. This is the hashed version of the password the user would use to login.

hashedSalt.description: A base64-encoded string. The salt used for hashing the hPassword.

hashedKmPassword.description: A base64-encoded string. The hashed password to be used for authenticating to the key manager.

hashedKmSalt.description: A base64-encoded string. The salt used for hashing the khPassword.

roles.description:
The roles object consists of the following possibilities:
For end-user accounts: INDIVIDUAL, ADMINISTRATOR, SUPER_ADMINISTRATOR, L1_SUPPORT, L2_SUPPORT, COMPLIANCE_OFFICER, SUPER_COMPLIANCE_OFFICER
For service accounts: INDIVIDUAL, USER_PROVISIONING, SCOPE_MANAGEMENT, CONTENT_MANAGEMENT, MALWARE_SCAN_MANAGER, MALWARE_SCAN_STATE_USER, AUDIT_TRAIL_MANAGEMENT
roles.x-intellij-html-description:
The roles object consists of the following possibilities:

  • For end-user accounts: INDIVIDUAL, ADMINISTRATOR, SUPER_ADMINISTRATOR, L1_SUPPORT, L2_SUPPORT, COMPLIANCE_OFFICER, SUPER_COMPLIANCE_OFFICER
  • For service accounts: INDIVIDUAL, USER_PROVISIONING, SCOPE_MANAGEMENT, CONTENT_MANAGEMENT, MALWARE_SCAN_MANAGER, MALWARE_SCAN_STATE_USER, AUDIT_TRAIL_MANAGEMENT

    • https://developers.symphony.com/restapi/reference#roles-object

keys.description: For SYSTEM users, to setup the RSA keys for authentication.

roles.description:
The roles object consists of the following possibilities:
For end-user accounts: INDIVIDUAL, ADMINISTRATOR, SUPER_ADMINISTRATOR, L1_SUPPORT, L2_SUPPORT, COMPLIANCE_OFFICER, SUPER_COMPLIANCE_OFFICER
For service accounts: INDIVIDUAL, USER_PROVISIONING, SCOPE_MANAGEMENT, CONTENT_MANAGEMENT, MALWARE_SCAN_MANAGER, MALWARE_SCAN_STATE_USER, AUDIT_TRAIL_MANAGEMENT
roles.x-intellij-html-description:
The roles object consists of the following possibilities:

  • For end-user accounts: INDIVIDUAL, ADMINISTRATOR, SUPER_ADMINISTRATOR, L1_SUPPORT, L2_SUPPORT, COMPLIANCE_OFFICER, SUPER_COMPLIANCE_OFFICER
  • For service accounts: INDIVIDUAL, USER_PROVISIONING, SCOPE_MANAGEMENT, CONTENT_MANAGEMENT, MALWARE_SCAN_MANAGER, MALWARE_SCAN_STATE_USER, AUDIT_TRAIL_MANAGEMENT

    • https://developers.symphony.com/restapi/reference#roles-object

action.description:
A string indicating the action to be performed on the user's RSA.

The following actions can be performed on the user's active RSA key:
SAVE
REVOKE.

The following actions can be performed onto the user's rotated RSA key:
REVOKE
EXTEND.

key.description: A string containing the user's RSA public key. The key must be 4096 bits. Only PKCS8 format is allowed.

expiration.description: An ISO 8601 timestamp containing the RSA key expiration date. This value is only set for rotated keys.

entitlements-inner.description: Feature entitlements to configure for the user.

postReadEnabled.description: Allows the user to read wall posts.

postWriteEnabled.description: Allows the user to write wall posts.

delegatesEnabled.description: Allows the user to have delegates.

isExternalIMEnabled.description: Allows the user to chat in external IM/MIMs.

canShareFilesExternally.description: Allows the user to share files externally.

canCreatePublicRoom.description: Allows the user to create internal public rooms.

canUpdateAvatar.description: Allows the user to edit profile picture.

isExternalRoomEnabled.description: Allows the user to chat in private external rooms.

canCreatePushedSignals.description: Allows the user to create push signals.

sendFilesEnabled.description: Allows the user to send files internally.

canUseInternalAudio.description: Allows the user to use audio in internal Meetings.

canUseInternalVideo.description: Allows the user to use video in internal Meetings.

canProjectInternalScreenShare.description: Allows the user to share screens in internal Meetings.

canViewInternalScreenShare.description: Allows the user to view shared screens in internal Meetings.

canCreateMultiLateralRoom.description: Allows the user to create multi-lateral room.

canJoinMultiLateralRoom.description: Allows the user to join multi-lateral room.

canUseFirehose.description: Allows the user to use Firehose.

canUseInternalAudioMobile.description: Allows the user to use audio in internal meetings on mobile.

canUseInternalVideoMobile.description: Allows the user to use video in internal meetings on mobile.

canProjectInternalScreenShareMobile.description: Allows the user to share screens in internal meetings on mobile.

canViewInternalScreenShareMobile.description: Allows the user to view shared screens in internal meetings on mobile.

canManageSignalSubscription.description: Allows the user to manage signal subscriptions.

canUpdateRoomHistoryProperty.description: Can Toggle Room's Share History Property.

canUseEncryptAPI.description: Allow user to use Agent Encrypt endpoints.

sdaPermissionsFullScreen.description: Enable Full screen access on SDA.

sdaPermissionsMidiSysex.description: Enable access to MIDI Sysex on SDA.

sdaPermissionsOpenExternalApp.description: Allow Opening External Apps from SDA.

roles-inner.description:
The roles object consists of the following possibilities:
For end-user accounts: INDIVIDUAL, ADMINISTRATOR, SUPER_ADMINISTRATOR, L1_SUPPORT, L2_SUPPORT, COMPLIANCE_OFFICER, SUPER_COMPLIANCE_OFFICER
For service accounts: INDIVIDUAL, USER_PROVISIONING, SCOPE_MANAGEMENT, CONTENT_MANAGEMENT, MALWARE_SCAN_MANAGER, MALWARE_SCAN_STATE_USER, AUDIT_TRAIL_MANAGEMENT
roles-inner.x-intellij-html-description:
The roles object consists of the following possibilities:

  • For end-user accounts: INDIVIDUAL, ADMINISTRATOR, SUPER_ADMINISTRATOR, L1_SUPPORT, L2_SUPPORT, COMPLIANCE_OFFICER, SUPER_COMPLIANCE_OFFICER
  • For service accounts: INDIVIDUAL, USER_PROVISIONING, SCOPE_MANAGEMENT, CONTENT_MANAGEMENT, MALWARE_SCAN_MANAGER, MALWARE_SCAN_STATE_USER, AUDIT_TRAIL_MANAGEMENT

    • https://developers.symphony.com/restapi/reference#roles-object

user-ids.description: Users to add or remove roles from.

emails.description: List of email addresses. Note that for this activity, you can use either the user-ids, the emails or the usernames, but only one at a time, you cannot mix and match them.

usernames.description: List of usernames. If username is specified, local must be set to true. It is possible to search for more than one username by separating them by comma. Note that for this activity, you can use either the user-ids, the emails or the usernames, but only one at a time, you cannot mix and match them.

local.description: If true then a local DB search will be performed and only local pod users will be returned. If absent or false then a directory search will be performed and users from other pods who are visible to the calling user will also be returned.

active.description: If true, it searches for active users only. If false, it searches for inactive users only. If not set, it searches for all users regardless of their status.

stream-id.description: Id of the stream for which to return members.
Id of the stream for which to return members.

types.description:
A list of stream types that will be returned. Options are IM (1-1 instant messages), MIM (multiparty instant messages), ROOM (rooms), POST (the user's wall). For more information, see the streamTypes section below.
If not specified, all types of streams are returned.

include-inactive-streams.description: Whether to include inactive conversations. A chatroom is inactive if it has been deactivated by an owner or admin. An IM or MIM is inactive if one of the participating users has been deactivated by an admin. If not specified, only active streams are returned.

types.description: A list of stream types that will be returned (IM, MIM, ROOM). If not specified, streams of all types are returned.

scope.description: The scope of the stream: INTERNAL (restricted to members of the calling user's company) or EXTERNAL (including members of the calling user's company, as well as another firm). If not specified, returns streams of either scope.

origin.description: The origin of the room: INTERNAL (created by a user of the calling user's company) or EXTERNAL (created by a user of another company). If not specified, returns streams of either origin. Only applies to chatrooms with External scope.

privacy.description: The privacy setting of the room: PRIVATE (members must be added) OR PUBLIC (anyone can join). If not specified, returns both private and public rooms. Only applies to chatrooms with internal scope.

status.description: The status of the room: ACTIVE or INACTIVE. If not specified, both active and inactive streams are returned.

start-date.description: Restricts result set to rooms that have been modified since this date (an Epoch timestamp specified in milliseconds). When specified along with endDate, enables the developer to specify rooms modified within a given time range.

end-date.description: Restricts result set to rooms that have been modified prior to this date (an Epoch timestamp specified in milliseconds). When specified along with startDate, enables the developer to specify rooms modified within a given time range.

query.description: The query which is searched for in room name, description, and optionally keywords. Case insensitive.

labels.description: A list of room keywords whose values will be queried.

active.description: If true, it restricts the search to active rooms. If false, it restricts the search to inactive rooms. If not specified, it includes both active and inactive rooms. Note that for inactive rooms, only rooms where the calling user is a member will be in the search scope; read the box “Room Search Scope” for further details.

private.description: If true, it includes only private rooms in the search results. If false, only public rooms are returned. If not specified, both public and private rooms are returned. Note that for inactive rooms, only discoverable rooms and rooms where the calling user is a member will be in the search scope; read the box “Room Search Scope” for further details.

creator-id.description: If provided, restricts the search to rooms created by the specified user.

owner-id.description: If provided, restricts the search to rooms owned by the specified user.

member-id.description: If provided, restricts the search to rooms where the specified user is a member.

sort-order.description: Sort algorithm to be used. Supports two values: BASIC (legacy algorithm) and RELEVANCE (enhanced algorithm).

since.description: Date, in ISO 8601 format, of the earliest possible data of the first message returned.

user-ids.description: List of user ids that this activity results will be restricted to their connections.

skip.description: Number of members to be skipped during return - used for pagination.

limit.description: Maximum number of members to be returned - used for pagination. Maximum allowed is 1000.

message-id-inner.description: Message identifier. Both safe url and Base64 encoded url are accepted.

stream-id-inner.description: Stream identifier. Both safe url and Base64 encoded url are accepted.

stream-id.description: Stream id object with the key "stream-id"

message-id.description: Message id having the attachment to forward. Both url safe and base64 encoded url are accepted.

attachment-id.description: Attachment id to forward. If not set, all attachments in the provided message are forwarded. Both url safe and base64 encoded url are accepted.

content-path.description: Path to the file to be attached to the message. The path is relative to the workflows folder.
